data.message: 16 years?!?! Wow!! I was 22yrs old when it 1st came out and I still jam this album to this day!! Both my kids (16 yrs and 12yrs)jams to this and all the others!!

replies.message: You let your 12 year old listen to this?

Yes we let our 12yr old daughter listen to this, she is old enough and smart enough to know whats right and wrong and our family is extremely musically inclined. So we expose our kids to all genres of music. U wanna say something about punk rock, metal, classical, or any thing else??? Im raising my children to b open minded and not judge. Maybe adults can learn frim that too.
Miscalculations happen at our age. Lol
Nah it's not your fault m'am the post first said 16 years it was edited afterwards.

Oh please done call me ma'am, that makes me feel even older. Lol. I just hope the judgmental person earlier read my reply. Children r exposed to so much now that its up to their parents to educate them, and i have. Music is inspirational for all ages. And violence and cursing r everywhere, listening to eminem is the least of it. I guess they thought they were talking to an uneducated person.
Well children shouldn't be kept sheltered. It's good to expose them to the harsh realities of the world very early on.
Grew  up listening to rap. And i love that♡
